item.title: Photography in Bergen
item.description: I love photography. And I am lucky enough to live in a country and city that makes it easy. Bergen Almost feels like cheating at times. Northern Lights This winter I went out looking at a meteor shower. I did not get any good photos of the shower itself, but I was able to capture the northern lights. Worth being tired the next day at work!
